hackathonSpotlight.label: Hackathon Spotlight
hackathonSpotlight.description: A full-stack tool built for maintenance contractors and operations teams to convert messy work orders + site photos into a structured cleansheet—then compare invoice totals vs. should-cost estimates to flag billing discrepancies.

project.title: Cleansheet Cost Estimation Tool
project.description: AI-powered cleansheet generator that turns job text + photos into structured task breakdowns, editable cost tables, and variance analytics for invoice review.
project.oneLiner: Built an AI-powered cost estimation tool projected to identify $30M+ in annual contractor billing discrepancies across enterprise maintenance portfolios (illustrative scenario).
project.overview: Designed to help teams quickly understand what work should cost, spot variance vs. invoices, and turn reactive auditing into repeatable cost intelligence.
keyFeatures: AI-powered data extraction: parses job descriptions + photos into itemized task breakdowns with time/cost estimates
Interactive cleansheet table: real-time editable rows, drag-and-drop reordering, automatic totals (labor + materials + overall)
Multi-source rate handling: supports invoice-derived rates or contractor default rates with conditional validation
Variance analytics dashboard: compares should-cost vs invoice totals with percentage variance indicators and alerts
Waterfall visualizations: hours/cost breakdown across prep, core tasks, and non-labor items (materials/equipment/permits)
Contractor management: CRUD for contractor profiles and default hourly rates

impactPotential.disclaimer: Impact numbers below are illustrative scenario math (not measured production outcomes). Actual results depend on adoption, data quality, invoice mix, and audit processes.
valueProposition: Reduces invoice audit time from hours to minutes, enabling review of more invoices with the same resources (target outcome)
Helps identify overcharges/inefficiencies via structured breakdown + variance signals (target outcome)

audienceCopy.technicalRecruiter: Built a full-stack multimodal AI app (React/TS + FastAPI) that extracts structured tasks from text + photos, powers an editable cleansheet UI, and computes variance analytics and visualizations.
audienceCopy.businessStakeholder: A cost-intelligence tool that turns unstructured work orders into standardized cleansheets and flags invoice vs should-cost variance—helping scale audit coverage and strengthen contractor negotiations.
